title: "AI seeks to analyze trader behaviour, but experts urge caution"
excerpt: "While traders are excited about the prospects of advisory services using data analytics, experts have sounded caution. Bengaluru-based Anastrat, for instance, uses AI to analyse historical data and trading patterns to help traders make investment decisions."
